next.excerpt:
We've already seen how badly the markets did as GME suddenly did incredibly well
last week. Hedge Funds and shorters of GME had to liquidate other investments in
order to do their aggressive short ladder attacks on GME.

Yet with all the action around GME, and with the current state of the world,…
next.title: While the GME rocket is preparing for launch, hedge funds are likely shorting other stocks and placing calls on GME

localize.title: 在GME火箭准备发射的同时，对冲基金可能正在做空其他股票，并对GME进行看涨。
localize.the_new_excerpt:
我们已经看到了市场的表现有多糟糕，因为GME突然表现得非常好。
上周，对冲基金和GME的做空者不得不清算o 对冲基金和做空GME的人不得不清算其他投资，在。
以便对GME进行积极的短梯攻击。

然而围绕着GME的行动，以及目前的世界现状，......

localize.title: 在GME火箭準備發射的同時，對沖基金可能正在做空其他股票，並對GME進行看漲。
